def_cn: 折中办法;妥协方案;介乎两者之间的事物
def_en: A half-way house is an arrangement or thing that has some of the qualities of two different things.

def_cn: （为出狱者、离院精神病人或已戒毒者设立的）过渡教习所，重返社会训练所
def_en: A halfway house is a home for people such as former prisoners, mental patients, or drug addicts who can stay there for a limited period of time to get used to life outside prison or hospital.
